HomePage.intro: Hi, I'm Jesús Olmos, a developer specialized in Next.js, passionate about technology, logic, and problem-solving. My focus goes beyond just writing code: I'm fascinated by building efficient, scalable, and well-structured solutions, where every line has a clear purpose. My development journey is not limited to JavaScript and TypeScript; Rust is another one of my great passions, a language that has taught me the value of performance, safety, and efficient resource management. I enjoy exploring new technologies, optimizing systems, and facing challenges that require logical and structured thinking. Here you'll find some of my projects, where I combine modern architectures, performance, and best practices, always aiming to create solid and efficient experiences.

experience1.title: Junior Backend Developer · CTICONTROL
experience1.description: Development of agricultural and livestock software for climate control based on the company’s legacy models built on C microcontrollers.

experience2.title: Indie Game Developer · Wolf King Studios
experience2.description: Development of short indie video games using Unity.

projectsIntro.main: Here you can see all my projects, both those I do to
projectsIntro.continue: and those I create to push my

project1.title: Web portfolio
project1.description: Development of a professional web portfolio with Next.js. Final degree project (TFG) for the Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development at IES JLMP.

project2.title: Art Gallery DBMS
project2.description: Database management system for an art gallery. Backend in Rust (Tauri) and frontend with Next.js using shadcn.

project3.title: Calculator
project3.description: Basic functional calculator developed in Android Studio. Project created as a class assignment for the Higher Degree in DAM.
